input.sentences: a young man went exploring one fine summer morning .
after many hours | he happened upon a man made rainbow with a restaurant attached on one end .
with much excitement | he went and ate inside this restaurant at the end of the rainbow .
with a full belly | the young man walked along the pier .
as the sun set | he watched the beautiful lights of the city .
output.sentences: Today was a beautiful morning for walk on the beach.
Whileon my walk, I came across rainbow like structure. Not sure what it was, I continued my hike.
There was a lovely restaurant that I ate it.
After lunch, I explored more of the pier, and watched the sunset.
Watching the sunset was beautiful, and the day was amazing.
